Name: Suely Scalla (Ademir) Melo Oliveira
Description:
Suely was killed in the early morning on Avenida Francisco Glicério - the city's main street. The police investigate a possible relation to a series of killings of homeless people in the city center.

Suely had been well-known in the LGBT community of Campinas since the 1980s.

TvT project: Tadashi HP, LGBT online portal, 8.12.2011

Name: Ursula
Description:
According to witnesses, Ursula was shot by a man who drove up in a car while she was standing on the street on R. Quinze de Novembro. He shot her in the head, then left the vehicle and fired another five shots.

TvT project: Em Tempo, online portal, 5.12.2011

Name: C. P. Juarez Quiroz
Description:
C.'s body was found in the street in the Las Torres neighborhood.She had been stabbed in the chest.

TvT partner organisation TVMex - Travestis Mexico, Resumen 2011

https://www.elheraldo.hn/sucesos/617580-219/muerto-hallan-a-otro-travesti-en-tegucigalpa

http://www.stillcounting.net/2013/01/16/murdered-401-500-2/ (#788)

http://app.conadeh.hn/Anual2012/lgbt.html

Name: (Pascual Ake Beh)
Description:
The vicitm's body was found at 7 am with gunshots in the neck.

Note that tdor.info gives the location as Almoloya, Mexico.

TvT project: Milenio, online portal, 5.12.2011; Por Esto, online portal, 5.12.2011

Name: Esmeralda (Jose) Severino da Silva
Description:
Esmeralda had been missing since 7 December, but her body was found only on the 9th by fishermen on the margins of a pond called Lagoa Mundau.

TvT project: Alagoas 24 Horas, online portal, 10.12.2011

Name: Name Unknown
Description:
The victim's body was found in the early morning on a piece of wasteland. The victim was a hairdresser and sex worker. Her body was found about two hours after she had left with a client. The police assume 'homophobia' to be the motive of the crime.

TvT project: Gay 1, online portal, 9.12.2011

Name: Luningning (Felix) Alsade
Description:
The victim's body was found naked with genital mutilations and burn wounds. In her left chest was stabbed in the form of a bra.

TvT partner organization: STRAP

Name: La Loba (Robert Alejandro) Fonseca
Description:
La Loba was murdered on Calle 72 by Daniel Fernando Sanchez Sequera, 36, a merchant who was a lover or client of hers. Sequera had driven with La Loba in his car, but after a discussion he left the car and shot her.

TvT project: Noticia Al Dia, online portal, 21.12.2011

Name: Perla Mora (Mario Vega)
Description:
Perla Mora's body was found beheaded, naked and presumably raped in a car on a camping-ground. Perla Mora was a police officer and an active member in the LGBT community.

TvT project: Minuto Uno, online portal, 13.12.2011

Name: Name Unknown
Description:
The victim's body was found at 6 am at a public garden on Calle Victoria. Bloodstains on the asphalt nearby suggested that they had been dragged along a street beforehand.

TvT project: El Diario, online portal, 13.12.2011

Name: Erica Hernandez
Description:
Erica was stabbed. 

> Erica Hernandez, a Latina transgender woman, died of stab wounds on December 17, 2011. A suspect, Titus Willis, is
currently awaiting trial for second degree murder. Media sources state that a second suspect believed to be involved is free.
>
> According to police and prosecutors, Erica reportedly got into an altercation with Titus Willis and a second person after
Hernandez, who knew and was visiting Willis, stepped on one of the suspects’ sunglasses. A verbal altercation escalated, and
became physical.
>
> At one point, one of the suspects allegedly stabbed Hernandez in the back of the neck. Hernandez was
pronounced dead at the emergency room.

http://www.cuav.org/wp-content/uploads/2012/08/1549_2011HVReportFINALstoriesofloss.pdf

Name: (Frederico) Claret dos Santos
Description:
The victim was killed with numerous hits on the head with a stone after leaving a snack-bar on the night of the 19th. The alleged perpetrator is 23 year-old Renan Donizeti Tomas, who reportedly had a relationship with the victim.

TvT project: EP Noticia, online portal, 20.12.2011

Name: Patricia (Fernando) Costa Alves
Description:
Patricia was shot to death on a yard where trucks park, and where reportedly drug dealers, sex workers and clients meet at night. On 5 February a trans person with the legal name of Tiago da Silva Carvalho was shot to death on the same location.

TvT project: Imagem Goias, online portal, 6.2.2012

Name: (Marvin Geovany) Ramos Miranda
Description:
The victim's body was recovered from a hotel room on 1 Avenida.

According to witnesses, the victim, who was a sex worker, had entered a hotel in the company of two others. Two further people then entered and attacked the hotel employees. The victim was killed with one of the sheets from the hotel room.x

Her body was recovered only around 10 hours after the killing.

TvT project: La Tribuna, 22.12.2011

Name: Natalia (Raimundo) Ferreira
Location: Jardim Paraiso, São José do Rio Preto
Description:
Natalia was stabbed at around 6 am in a motel. She died in hospital shortly after. According to a witness, the murder was committed by a motorcyclist.

TvT project: Diario Web, online portal, 23.12.2011

Name: Name Unknown
Description:
The victim's body was found dead on the morning of the 23rd on lying on the back seats of a car.

TvT project: La Prensa, online portal, 23.12.2011

Name: Bruninha (Regis) dos Santos Lima
Description:
Bruninha died on the 24th in hospital after she was shot in the face on the 21st on a cemetery on R. Bandeirantes in Apucarana.

On 21st October she had previously been stabbed in the chest and neck. Although Bruninha had then identified a 28 year-old woman as the perpetrator of the stabbing, she then did not want to enter legal action against her and the case was closed.

TvT partner organization: Grupo Gay da Bahia (Tabelas 2011)

Name: Fabiola
Description:
Fabiola was killed while working on Avenida Juarez.

The two previous days, two similar killings had occurred in the area, although it is not reported whether the victims were trans.

In November 2010, another trans sex worker called Fabiola and a further sex worker had been shot dead in the same area, and in November 2011, two trans sex workers were shot dead in the same area.

TvT project: La Poliaca, online portal

Name: Mona
Description:
Mona was shot three times in the back and foot on the street where she lived with other homeless persons by a person who passed by by foot. Among various hypothises, the police suspect the involvement of a local resident or merchant in the crime, who did not want the travesti to be around. According to neighbours, the night before, a person had set the belongings of homeless people on fire and fired shots at them, without hitting anybody.

TvT project: Em, online portal, 27.12.2011

Name: Magnolia (Odair) Barbosa da Silva
Description:
According to the police, Magnolia had come to Maringa from Umuarama several weeks before to do sex work.

TvT project: Maringa O Diario, online portal, 30.12.2011

Name: Githe (Orlando) Goines
Description:
Githe was strangled and their body dumped in a scrap yard. Their killing was reported as being the 198th homicide in New Orleans in 2011.

TvT project: The Times Picayune 30.12.2011; Youth Breakout 10.01.2012

Name: Dee Dee Pearson
Description:
A client of the victim was arrested and charged in the killing.

TvT project: CAMP, Kansas City, 05.01.2012
